name: Slender: Anxiety
storyline: You're in a forest stuck in desolation, and you make your way through the shadows of your surroundings. Your fear takes the better of you, and you want to make it out alive, but once you realize you are not alone, being alive is the last of your concern.
summary:
He will find you sooner or later

Slender: Anxiety is a short experimental horror game created by Hades Productions developed through the Unity3D engine. This game is based off Slender: The Arrival made by Blue Isle Studios and Parsec Productions.
